description: Try our easy to follow Battered Ling Burger recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Battered Ling Burger Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse ling fillets, then pat dry with kitchen paper, cover and set aside.
Meanwhile, make the salsa. Combine the mango, onion, lime juice and mint in a small bowl. Set aside.

For the batter, combine flour and cornflour in a bowl. Mix in lime rind, chilli and salt, to taste. Make a well in the middle. Mix egg yolk and 1 cup chilled water together and gradually add to the flour, mixing to form a batter.
Heat vegetable oil in a deep fryer or heavy-based wok or frying pan to 180Â°C or until a cube of bread browns in 15 seconds.

Dip fish into batter, drain excess, and place into hot oil. Cook fish, in two batches, for 5 minutes or until lightly golden. Remove and drain on crumpled paper towel, while cooking the remaining fish.
Spread halved burger rolls with mayonnaise. Fill with lettuce, fish, salsa and avocado and a little more mayonnaise, to serve.
